name: Pandora
temple_description:
Pandora was a special being made of clay by the Fire God Hephaestus, and was given to humans as punishment for Prometheus' crime of stealing fire. She has a beautiful appearance and extraordinary charm.
In addition, she possesses a magic box gifted by Zeus, which will bring endless disasters to mankind if this box was to be opened.

active_skills.name: Box of Calamity
active_skills.effect: 50% chance to inflict Weaken, reducing enemy's ATK by 50% for 2 rounds

active_skills.name: Malicious Will
active_skills.effect: DMG is doubled if target is affected by any debuff
